original_title: Sri Lanka sells Rs115bn in 2026, 2030 bonds
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka has sold 115 billion rupees of 2026, 2028 and 2030 bonds, at an auction on January 11, after offering 130 billion data from the state debt office said.
All 45 billion rupees of 01 Feb 2026 bonds offered were sold at 13.83 percent.
All 45 billion rupees of 15 March 2028 bonds were sold at 14.51 percent.
25.97 billion rupees of 2030 bonds were sold at 14.22 percent.
